#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll gcd(ll a,ll b){
    if(a%b==0) return b;
    else return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main(){


    ll k,n,i,x,m=0,j;
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
    ll s,a[n];
    for(i=0;i<n;++i) scanf("%lld",&a[i]);

    for(i=1;i<n;++i){
        x=a[i-1];
        j=i;
        s=0;
        while(j<n&&x>=k){
            x=gcd(x,a[j++]);
            if(x>=k) s++;
        }
        if(s>=m) m=s;
        if(s>n-i-1) break;
    }
    if(m==0)cout<<0<<"\n";
        else cout<<m+1<<"\n";
    return 0;
}
